name: Panch Out
shortDescription: A digital dice-based baseball board game that simulates batting and pitching outcomes, featuring Online, Offline (vs CPU), and Local Multiplayer modes.
fullDescription:
Panch Out is an exciting digital version of a dice baseball board game, blending strategy and chance. The gameplay revolves around rolling dice to determine all actions on the field, offering familiar baseball outcomes like strikes, outs, hits, and home runs.

Key Features:

  • Game Modes: Play Online, Offline (vs CPU), or with Friends in Local Multiplayer.
  • Game Length Options: Choose between Quick (3 innings), Normal (6 innings), or Classic (9 innings) matches.
  • Dice Mechanics: Each roll determines outcomes such as Hit, Double (2B), Triple (3B), Home Run, Foul, Out, Double Play, or Strike.
  • Customization: Select avatars, set usernames, and personalize your player profile.
  • Social Play: Log in as a Guest or connect with Facebook for added features.
  • Game Tracking: The interface displays a full baseball diamond and keeps track of innings, strikes, outs, and runs for both players.
